description:
Gerber knows a good knife needs to be reliable. When they designed the Order they enlisted the help of US disaster relief teams. The result is a compact folder that tucks out of the way when you don’t need it but is ready for anything when you do.

  • 420HC blade is easy to sharpen and holds an edge well
  • Blade is treated with a black ceramic coating which helps reduce wear and corrosion
  • Textured rubber over-moulded glass-reinforced nylon handle provides a secure grip
  • Time tested lock back design provides an extra measure of safety
  • Pocket clip is set up for right handed tip-down carry
  • Lanyard hold gives you carry options
name: Gerber Order Drop Point Serrated Knife
